title: vinaip-piravi
sahitya:
vinaip-piravi kaNakkait-tIrttu viDudalai sheivAi ennappanE


anupallavi

  inippiravi Edum inri iha param enum vaghaiyuminri


caraNam    kaNakk pArttu aintoghaiyum kaTTinEnayyA kaDanuDanellAm uDanuDanE 
kaimEl Indanan paNak-kAma maN paTru vazhiyillai parindini ennai urimai koNDE
